IonicSecurity::SDK::MetadataHolder Class Reference

A base class used by several other classes that wish to store metadata. More...

Detailed Description

A base class used by several other classes that wish to store metadata.

See MetadataHolder::SetMetadata(const String^, const String^) for information on what metadata properties are.

See also
MetadataHolder::SetMetadata(const String^, const String^)

Member Function Documentation

◆ GetMetadata()

const String IonicSecurity::SDK::MetadataHolder::GetMetadata ( const String^  mwsName)

Get single metadata property.

Parameters
[in]mwsNameThe name of the metadata property to get.

See Agent::SetMetadata(const String^, const String^) for information on what metadata properties are.

Returns
The value of the metadata property, if it was found. Otherwise, nullptr is returned.
See also
MetadataHolder::SetMetadata(const String^, const String^)

◆ SetMetadata()

void IonicSecurity::SDK::MetadataHolder::SetMetadata ( const String^  mwsName,
const String^  mwsValue 
)

Add / update a metadata property.

Parameters
[in]mwsNameThe name of the metadata property.
[in]mwsValueThe value of the metadata property.

If a metadata property with the same name already exists, it will be overwritten. Otherwise, a new metadata property will be added.

See Agent::SetMetadata(const String^, const String^) for information on what metadata properties are.

See also
MetadataHolder::GetMetadata(const String^)

Property Documentation

◆ Metadata

MetadataDictionary^ IonicSecurity::SDK::MetadataHolder::Metadata
getset

All metadata properties with the provided dictionary.

Parameters
[in]dictMetadataThe metadata properties.
Returns
A dictionary of all the agent metadata properties.

When set, any existing metadata properties will be lost. The provided metadata dictionary will become the full set of metadata properties on the agent.

See Agent::SetMetadata(const String^, const String^) for information on what metadata properties are.

See also
MetadataHolder::SetMetadata(const String^, const String^)
MetadataHolder::GetMetadata(const String^)
